DOC.brief_summary: Patients who have completed the 16 weeks treatment of the CHEST-1 trial (study number 11348) will be asked to participate in this long term extension study with BAY63-2521. The aim of the long term study is to collect additional information to evaluate the safety and tolerability of BAY63-2521. Patients will be treated with open label medication on their individual optimal dose between 0,5 mg - 2,5 mg tid.
DOC.brief_title: BAY63-2521 - Long-term Extension Study in Patients With Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Patients who have completed 16 weeks of treatment in the double blind trial CHEST 1 Patients who have an ongoing serious adverse event from CHEST 1 that is assessed as related to BAY632521 are not allowed to participate in the extension trial.
